title: Question concerning height of Commission
body: Please write an e-mail with the inquiry whether an order has resulted for me from a joint live workshop in the context of a cooperation. Please write in {targetlanguage} and in the {prompt}.

title: Target audiences with partnerships
body: I want you to act as a market research expert that speaks and writes fluent {targetlanguage}. Pretend that you know everything about every market also in {targetlanguage}. List ten types of company my brand should consider Brand Partnerships with to reach my target audience. Give each type a name and an emoji. For each: give the benefit to my brand and also the benefit to the brand partner. All your output shall be in {targetlanguage} language. The brand (first line), category (second line) and target audience (third line) are: {prompt}
